item.title: Simple Image Manipulation With Intervention Image
item.description: A lot of web applications include some sort of photo uploading functionality. Whether it’s allowing a user to upload a personal avatar or to create and manage an entire photo gallery with watermarking features, it’s somewhat of a pain to code. PHP includes several built-in functions for accomplishing this using the GD library but they’re cumbersome at best. Luckily someone else feels your pain and has written a class that makes it a snap to work with images.
